text:
[Verse]
In the night sky shines
Dreams are taking flight
Every twinkle bright
Casts away the night

[Verse 2]
Wishes whispered low
Secret hearts aglow
Far above they go
Where the starlights show

[Chorus]
Shooting stars they blaze
In the cosmic haze
Light up darkened ways
Endless nights we praise

[Verse 3]
Every spark a guide
In the dreams we hide
Feel the cosmic tide
Stars don't ever lie

[Bridge]
Floating high above
In a sky we love
Like a hand in glove
Fit the stars thereof

[Chorus]
Shooting stars they blaze
In the cosmic haze
Light up darkened ways
Endless nights we praise
title: Shooting Stars
